problem.markdown: >>Fluorescence microscopy will be able to tell whether a material is cytocompatible:<< ( ) Yes, cytocompatibility can be clearly confirmed ( ) Yes, cytocompatibility can be easily quantified (x) Yes, can provide an indication through in vitro tests ( ) Yes, and needs no confirmation via in vivo tests
problem.p: Fluorescence microscopy will be able to tell whether a material is cytocompatible:

choicegroup.label: Fluorescence microscopy will be able to tell whether a material is cytocompatible:
choicegroup.choice: Yes, cytocompatibility can be clearly confirmed
Yes, cytocompatibility can be easily quantified
Yes, can provide an indication through in vitro tests
Yes, and needs no confirmation via in vivo tests
